simplifiedChinese.title: Signs Four & Five
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What were the two signs Jesus performed in this story?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: Jesus' acts and his words are linked together. How do his words help you understand the signs better?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What most amazes you about Jesus in this story?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: How do people respond to Jesus' signs and teaching? How will you respond to Jesus' signs and teaching?
